title: @riot any chance for an unforseen blizzard?
body: wasn't sure where this was supposed to go, but being that it was a question thought i'd shove it under help. Any chance that we'll get some legendary snowballing again this year?????

replies.body:
Ah, you're talking about [**this event**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/oixW2ira-faq-legendary-snowball-december-23rd-january-7th) from last year. I haven't seen any official announcement for something like this for this Snowdown, so I'd recommend keeping an eye on the[** News**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/).

Let me know if you have any questions.
